introduction.paragraph: This request returns all the users in the specified database.

topic.title: Request
topic.body: This request does not require any particular request header or query parameter.

unordered-list.list-item: 200 OK â€“ Returns the list of users as an array of strings

body.paragraph: This response uses only standard HTTP headers.
The message body contains the list of users in a JSON array. Each element of the array is a string representing the name of a user in the specified database.
The following request returns all the users in the database cookbook.
body.code-block: GET /cookbook/_user/ HTTP/1.1 Host: localhost:4985 Content-Type: application/json

HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Length: 140 Content-Type: application/json Server: Couchbase Sync Gateway
["chef123", "zack", "adam", "pasin"]
